author: NewsBreak Original
title: Russell Wilson likes post claiming he has ‘outplayed’ Patrick Mahomes just hours after reports Broncos will bench NFL QB
text: RUSSELL Wilson has liked a social media post claiming he has played better than Patrick Mahomes shortly after getting benched by the Denver Broncos. The 34-year-old nine-time Pro Bowl quarterback has been benched for the final two games of the season in favor of backup Jarrett Stidham. Denver has lost three of their last four games, including most recently a brutal 20-14 Week 16 loss to the New England Patriots. The Broncos have just a six percent chance of making the playoffs as they sit with a 7-8 record. On Tuesday, reports were revealed that Denver has decided to bench Wilson in Weeks 17 and 18. The benching is seemingly financially motivated as Wilson is set to receive a $37 million guarantee in the 2025 season if he fails a physical in March. After the benching, Wilson liked numerous posts on X that defended him. One of the posts that Wilson liked centered around his stats in 2023 which claimed he has "outplayed" Kansas City Chiefs star quarterback Patrick Mahomes. The post brought up that Wilson and Mahomes both have 26 passing touchdowns, but the Broncos signal-caller has eight interceptions, compared to the Chiefs quarterback's 14 picks. And Wilson has three rushing touchdowns, while Mahomes has zero. Wilson also liked a post from former NFL star-turned-ESPN analyst Robert Griffin III, who wrote: "Mad respect for how you have handled this entire situation @DangeRussWilson. "When you were disrespected, you still showed respect. When you were threatened, you led your team to wins. When you were torn down, you kept building up your guys and never wavered. God’s got your back." On Tuesday night, Wilson took to X and made a cryptic post to his 5.5 million followers. "God’s got me. Looking forward to what’s next," Wilson wrote. The Broncos face the Los Angeles Chargers on Sunday. Denver will officially be eliminated with a loss.

author: @Shakeel Anjum
title: Church attacked in Islamabad: priest
text: ISLAMABAD: The priest of Saint John’s Church at H-9 claimed that a gang equipped with sophisticated weapons stormed the worship place at about 8:30 on Thursday. Priest Imran Masih informed the Industrial Area police about it in his written complaint the same night. The complainant said that three among the six attackers had been identified as Sohail, Asif Chattha and Mithu, adding that they were equipped with SMGs and pistols. He said the attackers also took away the sound system. The police have started an investigation. author: Sächsische Zeitung
title: Illegale Müllhalde in Nordsachsen entdeckt: Reifen, Tanks und Gewerbemüll
text:
Illegale Müllhalde in Nordsachsen entdeckt: „Solche Taten belasten die Gebührenzahler“
Der Berg von Unrat wurde illegal auf einem Waldweg bei Laußig entsorgt.
Quelle: Gemeindeverwaltung Laußig
Nordsachsen. Ein erschreckender Fund sorgt derzeit für Besorgnis bei der Umweltwacht des Landkreises Nordsachsen: In einem abgelegenen Waldstück unweit der Kiesgrube bei Laußig wurde eine illegale Müllhalde entdeckt, die selbst erfahrene Umweltfachleute fassungslos zurückließ.
Die Dimension der Ablagerung, aber auch die Art der aufgefundenen Materialien lassen auf eine systematische Entsorgungsaktion schließen. Den Angaben zufolge handelte es sich nicht nur um gewöhnlichen Unrat: Es wurden mehrere Lkw-Reifen, mit Kraftstoffresten gefüllte Tanks, diverse Kabelreste sowie Kunststoffverkleidungen und andere potenziell umweltschädliche Materialien gemeldet.
Ermittlungen zur Herkunft des Mülls
Der Verdacht liegt nahe, dass es sich bei dem Müll um die Hinterlassenschaften eines gewerblichen Betriebs handelt. „Aufgrund der Menge und der spezifischen Zusammensetzung der Abfälle können wir einen professionellen Ursprung nicht ausschließen“, erklärte Dr. Eckhardt Rexroth, Umweltdezernent des Landkreises. Derzeit laufen Ermittlungen zur Herkunft des Mülls, doch bislang konnte kein konkreter Verursacher identifiziert werden.
Dieser Vorfall ist jedoch kein Einzelfall. Allein im Jahr 2024 wurden im Landkreis Nordsachsen rund 290 Tonnen illegal entsorgter Abfälle festgestellt – eine alarmierende Bilanz, die verdeutlicht, wie ernst das Problem inzwischen geworden ist. Besonders dramatisch: Der Großteil des Abfalls – etwa 209 Tonnen – bestand aus haushaltsüblichem Restmüll, der offensichtlich in großem Stil bewusst außerhalb regulärer Entsorgungswege abgeladen wurde.
Hinzu kamen 59 Tonnen Bauschutt und schadstoffbelastete Materialien wie asbesthaltige Baustoffe, 16 Tonnen Sperrmüll sowie sechs Tonnen Grünabfälle. Selbst ausgediente Reifen und vollständig ausgeschlachtete Fahrzeugwracks wurden an unterschiedlichen Orten aufgefunden.
Kosten sind für den Steuerzahler immens
Solche Umweltdelikte bleiben nicht ohne Folgen – weder für Natur und Umwelt, noch für die Bürgerinnen und Bürger. Die Beseitigung dieser illegalen Müllberge verursacht erhebliche Kosten, die am Ende von der Allgemeinheit getragen werden müssen.
Im Jahr 2024 beliefen sich die Ausgaben des Landkreises für die Entsorgung und Sanierung betroffener Flächen auf rund 300.000 Euro. „Damit belasten solche Taten unmittelbar die Gebührenzahlerinnen und -zahler“, mahnt Rexroth.
Müll-Verursacher finden: So können die Bürger mithelfen
Um künftig schneller reagieren und illegale Ablagerungen zügiger beseitigen zu können, setzt die Umweltwacht verstärkt auf die Mithilfe der Bevölkerung. Bürgerinnen und Bürger, die verdächtige Aktivitäten oder bereits bestehende Müllablagerungen beobachten, werden gebeten, diese umgehend zu melden. Hierfür stehen mehrere unkomplizierte Wege zur Verfügung: Entweder per E-Mail an [umweltwacht@asg-nordsachsen.de] oder über die Abfall-App des Landkreises, in der sich über den integrierten Mängelmelder der genaue Fundort mithilfe von Adresseingabe oder GPS-Daten präzise übermitteln lässt.
„Jeder Hinweis zählt“, betont die Umweltwacht. Nur durch das Zusammenwirken von Behörden und aufmerksamen Bürgern könne es gelingen, die zunehmende Umweltverschmutzung einzudämmen.

author: Kelvin
title: Amy Adams e o Disney+ se unem para uma história inusitada.
text:
No início de 2025, o público brasileiro poderá assistir a “Canina”, novo filme de Amy Adams, diretamente no Disney+. A plataforma oficializou o lançamento em suas redes sociais, apontando 24 de janeiro de 2025 como a data de estreia. Este [filme ](https://www.em.com.br/emfoco/2024/12/23/sonic-3-o-filme/)destaca a performance de Adams, que lhe rendeu uma indicação ao Globo de Ouro 2025 na categoria de Melhor Atriz em Filme de Comédia ou Musical.
A história de “Canina”, baseada no livro homônimo de Rachel Yoder, segue uma artista que abandona sua carreira para cuidar de seu filho recém-nascido. Com o passar do tempo, ela começa a se confrontar com a pressão desta nova rotina, levando-a a acreditar que está se transformando em um cachorro. O longa-metragem é dirigido e escrito por Marielle Heller, conhecida por seu trabalho aclamado em “Poderia Me Perdoar?”.
Quem são os membros do elenco de “Canina”?
Além de Amy Adams, o elenco do filme “Canina” conta com a participação de Scoot McNairy, conhecido por sua atuação em “Narcos: México”. A colaboração entre Adams e McNairy promete intensificar a narrativa do longa, trazendo à tona os desafios emocionais enfrentados pelos personagens.
Quais são as expectativas para a estreia de “Canina” no Brasil?
A estreia de “Canina” no Brasil vem após sua apresentação no Festival do Rio 2024, onde já começou a gerar expectativas. Com uma trama inovadora e um elenco talentoso, o filme tem potencial para cativar o público e consolidar-se como um dos destaques da nova temporada de lançamentos cinematográficos.
Que outros lançamentos cinematográficos estão previstos para 2025?
O ano de 2025 promete ser agitado para os cinéfilos, com uma série de estreias aguardadas. Entre os destaques, incluem-se:
- “Anora”, vencedor da Palma de Ouro em Cannes
- “Conclave”, com Ralph Fiennes
- “Mickey 17”, novo filme do diretor de “Parasita”
- “Um Completo Desconhecido”, cinebiografia de Bob Dylan
- “Vitória”, estrelado por Fernanda Montenegro
Quais são os desafios enfrentados por Amy Adams na interpretação de sua personagem em “Canina”?
Na pele de uma artista e mãe enfrentando transformações psicológicas, Amy Adams oferece uma atuação complexa e emotiva. Os desafios consistem em equilibrar a intensidade emocional da personagem com a sutileza necessária para transmitir sua crescente inquietação. Esta performance, que já rendeu a Adams uma indicação ao Globo de Ouro, destaca sua versatilidade e capacidade de se reinventar em papéis desafiadores.
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->online media outlet

title: Anita Lo Leaves Rickshaw Dumpling Bar
text:
Sad news for Rickshaw Dumpling Bar in NYC as Top Chef Master's alum Anita Lo decided not to renew her contract.

Anita Lo has decided not to renew her contract with Rickshaw Dumpling Bar, a company she co-founded five years ago.

author: Staff Reporter
title: Alicante Central Station will soon be a Reality
text:
The President of the Generalitat, Carlos Mazón, reaffirmed the government’s commitment to expediting the development of the future Alicante Central Station. “We are working to ensure that the station becomes a reality as soon as possible,” Mazón stated during a visit to the construction site of a temporary parking facility at the Adif premises.
Accompanied by the regional Minister for the Environment, Infrastructure, and Territory, Vicente Martínez Mus; the President of the Alicante Provincial Council, Toni Pérez; and the Mayor of Alicante, Luis Barcala, Mazón underscored the importance of the project. He described the station as a “strategic initiative for mobility and connectivity in the province of Alicante,” adding that construction efforts are advancing “at a good pace with determination and priority.”
The temporary parking facility, expected to open by summer 2025, will provide 250 spaces. A new access route to the parking area has also been established, alongside fencing of the site. Preliminary work has included surveys, building inspections, and the reconfiguration of nearby routes. By mid-January, new access points to the parking area will be introduced in collaboration with Alicante City Council and Adif.
Current construction activities involve dismantling disused railway tracks and facilities on land ceded by Adif. Preparatory studies, inspections, and groundwork have been completed to lay the foundation for the main construction phase. Looking ahead to 2025, the removal of affected infrastructure in the Salamanca Avenue tunnel area is planned, followed by the construction of pile walls and excavations.
Mazón praised the collaboration between different administrative bodies, highlighting the continuous dialogue between the Ministry and the City Council to address residents’ needs.
He emphasised that Alicante Central Station will be “one of the most advanced and interconnected in the country” and represents “one of the Generalitat’s most significant investments in Alicante.”
The project reflects the shared commitment of local and regional authorities to enhancing transportation infrastructure and fostering greater connectivity for the city and the region.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->construction and property

author: UK Sport
title: Resident says houses are in a state of ‘absolute disaster after tornado’
text:
Resident says houses are in a state of ‘absolute disaster after tornado’
Strong winds whipped through Stalybridge, in Tameside, on Wednesday, damaging around 100 properties, according to the council.
A village resident has told of houses in states of “absolute disaster” after a “localised tornado” hurtled through a town in Greater Manchester.
Strong gusts whipped through Stalybridge, in Tameside, on Wednesday, damaging around 100 properties, according to the council.
Hayley McCaffer, who lives with her partner in the village of Carrbrook, told the PA news agency that they have been “fairly lucky” compared with some of their neighbours.
Ms McCaffer, 40, said: “Some of the neighbours’ houses are an absolute disaster – the roof missing, gable ends gone, cars squished with all the stone that’s come off the houses.
“Luckily for us, very luckily, we were in the pub last night when it happened.
She said she was alerted to the “tornado” by a phone call from her mother, who lives locally and whose roof was partially ripped off by winds before parts landed on her car.
Emergency services were cordoning off the area when Ms McCaffer and her partner arrived back at their home, and they allowed them to enter and collect some essentials.
“It was dark so we could see big piles of debris and people’s bits of houses missing,” she told PA.
“But we were safe and that was the main thing,” she added.
“We’ve got insurance, hopefully that will be covered.
“And, you know, when things like this happen, there’s lots of people who are worse off than us, so we can’t really complain too much.”
Patricia Watkinson, who also lives in Carrbrook, was away in Norfolk when gusts swept through the village but was told by a neighbour that apart from a “dangling” aerial her home appears undamaged.
The 83-year-old told the PA news agency: “I’m glad I wasn’t there.
“My neighbour, she just rang me, and her shed is gone and the fence is gone. Hopefully, all that is wrong with mine is the aerial dangling.”

author: @ciudad_magazine
title: Cómo hizo Emanuel Ortega para conquistar a Julieta Prandi en medio de la pandemia | Ciudad Magazine
text: En 202 Julieta Prandi [ atravesaba el peor momento de su vida](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/10/20/julieta-prandi-le-dedico-a-emanuel-ortega-un-romantico-posteo-por-su-cumpleanos-gracias-por-ser-todo-eso/), en medio de un conflicto económico y legal [por la tenencia de sus hijos ](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/08/14/julieta-prandi-hablo-de-su-historia-de-amor-con-emanuel-ortega-cumplimos-3-anos-y-estoy-muy-enamorada/)con su ex, Claudio Contardi, pero en medio del vendaval, la tormenta cedió y llegó la luz de la mano de Emanuel Ortega. La modelo estuvo este jueves en Cortá por Lozano donde le contó a la conductora cómo conoció al cantante a través e Instagram en medio del aislamiento por la pandemia de covid de 2020 y calificó su relación de “merecida”. “Cuando las pasaste todas, llega un momento en que decís ‘Tiene que ser una buena para mí”, dijo. Asimismo, Julieta contó que se conoció de “una manera medio ridícula” con Ortega, debido a que él le escribió por Instagram, algo a lo que no estaba acostumbrada. “Él vio una foto de Cuba, yo había ido hacía poquito allí, justo antes de que cerrara todo. (…) La vio como dos meses después y me escribe. Me dice cosas hermosas”, recordó. Leé más: [Pampita volvió a hablar de Nicole Neumann y Julieta Prandi y explicó qué quiso decir con su polémica frase](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2024/01/09/pampita-volvio-a-hablar-de-nicole-neumann-y-julieta-prandi-y-explico-que-quiso-decir-con-su-polemica-frase/) CÓMO EMPEZÓ EL ROMANCE DE JULIETA PRANDI Y EMANUEL ORTEGA EN MEDIO DE UNA CRISIS Y LA PANDEMIA “De casualidad veo su mensaje porque estaba como en el buzón de ‘no deseado’ porque no nos seguíamos. Y a mí Emanuel me gustó siempre”, dijo la modelo, y contó que, como no podía creerlo, se dedicó a chequear que fuera el verdadero cantante. “Y nos pusimos a charlar, y al otro día estábamos hablando por teléfono y eso se convirtió en una rutina de todos los días durante dos meses. Cinco horas hablábamos por teléfono”, recordó Julieta, que contó que nunca en todo ese tiempo quiso hacer videollamada. “Quería que el primer encuentro fuese en vivo. Era yo enamorándome de su voz y de lo que escuchaba y él escuchándome a mí y yo contándole la verdad”, recordó, y contó que lo primero que hizo cuando se encontraron fue darse un largo abrazo, a lo que le siguieron, algunas horas después, los primeros besos, que todavía hoy perduran. Leé más: [Julieta Prandi habló de los rumores de crisis e infidelidades con Emanuel Ortega: “¡Qué delirio!”](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/exclusivo/2023/12/28/julieta-prandi-hablo-de-los-rumores-de-crisis-e-infidelidades-con-emanuel-ortega-que-delirio/)
